name: Educational
short_description: Resources and materials to support learning and teaching.
long_description: This category includes products designed to facilitate education at various levels. Here you will find books, educational software, online courses, and tools that promote the development of knowledge and skills in different fields.

name: Entertainment
short_description: Products for leisure and personal enjoyment, from games to multimedia.
long_description: The entertainment category covers a variety of products including video games, movies, music, and interactive applications. It is designed to offer fun and relaxation for people of all ages.

name: Scientific
short_description: Equipment and resources for scientific research and development.
long_description: This section offers specialized products for laboratories, universities, and research institutions. It includes measuring instruments, analytical software, and materials for experimentation and scientific study.
